input.sentences: the belly dancer arrived for her first lesson of the day .
the photographer got good shots for the participants .
she showed them hand movements to go with the hips .
the gathered interest allowed for signups for the next session to happen .
output.sentences: The dancer attended a party with friends.
The hippie photographer was circling around taking pictures.
He couldn't help taking so many pictures of the dancer's hips.
The photographer tried to distract himself with cake.
While his friends had a little gossip session.
